review: This is the third ROKU we have bought. .I got this one to replace a Panasonic USB WiFi Lan adapter on a Panasonic 55" Plasma. The Panasonic adapter was OK, but you had to jump through too many hoops to get to the "smart" programming, sometime having trouble connecting to the WiFi network. With the ROKU Stick, I just change input on TV, and there is ROKU ready to go. No problem connecting, or holding WiFi signal. I also used the USB port on TV for power. (be sure and check USB port voltage and amps, meters sold on Amazon). Some USB ports will not support this item. But, the USB converter is included.We also have a ROKU Angry Birds. We have had it for about 3 years, with no problems.My other ROKU is built into a 40" TCL TV, also sold on Amazon, ( http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00K7NCS9G/ref=oh_aui_search_detailpage?ie=UTF8&psc;=1 ). Just check out the reviews. This was bought for my shop/mancave. Perfect size, and at 22lbs. it fit on my articulating mount put up for a smaller TV.
